thread.section_title: Hilton Beijing Wangfujing - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Really need to be renovated
thread.title_full: Really need to be renovated - Review of Hilton Beijing Wangfujing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Abraham S
title: Really need to be renovated
text:
This hotel urgently needs to be refurnish; our guest room smell to humidity and we requested to be changed but they did not have a better alternative. The lounge was dirty when we arrived, the general impression we had is that it was dirty and not well maintained. We cancel the stay after one night and move to other hotel.
The star tried to help us and were very friendly.
